website_summaries.verdict: It's pricey, but it's a great fit for those who haven't had any success with drugstore mouthwash brands.
pros: No flavor for those who don't enjoy mint mouthwashes
One of the most popular brands recommended by dentists
cons: Expensive compared to the other products listed here

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: My dentist gave me this to help with my receding gums and general oral health. It's a lot less harsh than alcohol based mouthwash (Lister***), so it's easy on the mouth but still makes your mouth feel clean. I got it free at the Dentist and was glad it's on Amazon so I could buy more when I ran out.
customer_reviews.author: daustin

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my dentist.
customer_reviews.text: This mouthwash and the Closys toothpaste were recommended by my dentist to reduce mouth bacteria and help prevent periodontal disease. I've used it for almost a year now and it seems to help quite a bit, as my checkups are fine. Used at bedtime it seems to reduce the "morning mouth" feeling. Doctors are now saying that reducing mouth bacteria is important for general body health, so I'll continue to use this. It comes with a very small bottle of peppermint flavoring, but actually I don't bother with that, as the mouthwash itself is flavorless and I don't care for the peppermint taste. It isn't really any more expensive than other mouthwashes, especially with the Amazon subscription service.
customer_reviews.author: J Quinlan

customer_reviews.title: Superior Mouth-Cleaning
customer_reviews.text: A mild but effective oral rinse that leaves the mouth feeling clean. Comes with an intensely concentrated peppermint oil that can be used drop by drop for each use, or if you're like me and not all that patient, you can use the entire vial on the mouthwash. Gives a hint of mint flavor. No sweetners used, no dyes, just straight up mouth-cleaning product that over time improves daily breath odors. I have noticed a significant reduction in morning breath since using this product.
customer_reviews.author: pandorales

customer_reviews.title: Gentle mouthwash that the dentist recommends!
customer_reviews.text: My dentist had this mouthwash in her office, and she encouraged me to use it after I had my cleaning done. I bought it, and I really did enjoy it! It comes with a little mint flavoring bottle that I throw away, because the taste is not bad at all. The taste is actually quite absent. It is an easy, burn-less rinse and my teeth look whiter than ever. I think that this mouthwash is a lot better than those cheap Listerine bottles of fire, or those mouthwashes that leave a dark stain on your teeth! How horrifying. This mouthwash is clear and unflavored, which is perfect for me. The bottle is also huge!
customer_reviews.author: Fobetta Ophowerse

customer_reviews.title: Taste takes getting used to
customer_reviews.text: This is one step up from another brand that tasted like purified water. Has a light bleachy, medicinal taste. Takes some getting used to. And if you don’t acclimate, makes an excellent appetite suppressant. Won’t buy this again. A pricey experiment.
customer_reviews.author: flowers

customer_reviews.title: CloSys Quality Mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: I have had extensive dental work including implants and crowns due to teeth lost due to gum disease. The dentist recommended CloSys because it eliminates common bacteria in the mouth. I have used CloSys regularly for several years & the tissue quality of my gums has improved. It is also a plus to not have to worry about bad breath. I am happy to be able to have CloSys shipped automaticallly every 3 months & the 32 oz. bottles last a long time. I highly recommend this product over regular mouthwash that is comprised mainly of alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: being my personal dentist
customer_reviews.text: got this rinse to help daily oral routine. don't use flavor,for me better without it. not getting any younger, this helps very much used twice daily. really can tell fresh oral feeling after each use. recommend it. helps do dentist's work for him. less trips there the better. want to keep my teeth.
customer_reviews.author: satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Better checkups with Closys
customer_reviews.text: My dentist and periodontist cleanings have been less of an ordeal since I started using Closys twice a day. I don't know if it is strictly the result of using Closys or not, but I think it is a factor. If you use a rinse/mouthwash, it seems that Closys is worth considering. It tastes better than all of the rest, and it seems to yield good results. I have Amazon deliver 2 bottles every two months and it is much cheaper than purchasing it at my dentist's office or at one of the few drugstores that seem to carry it.
customer_reviews.author: librarian's daughter

customer_reviews.title: Best for sensitive kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after doing research for my son who gets frequent aphthous ulcers (those painful white-rimmed craters). Never knew why he got so many, but began to suspect sulfates. This mouthwash and the Closys toothpaste have reduced the frequency so significantly, that is is **rare** he gets one. And the best part?? The mouthwash is about as offensive as rinsing with water. NO TASTE and NO STING. You can always add natural peppermint that comes with it, but my son is so sensitive to the strong mint taste typical of regular mouthwash, he prefers it plain. YAY!
customer_reviews.author: Melbourne Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great mouth rinse!
customer_reviews.text: This mouthwash has no flavor & helps make your mouth oxygenated which is supposed to be good for your mouth & breath. When I wake up in the middle of the night with an extremely dry mouth, I swish it around & my mouth feels so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Wiz

customer_reviews.title: No more burning and nasty morning breath!
customer_reviews.text: I hate the burning sensation resulted by the mouthwash available in the local stores. Some other mouthwashes, even though they have "alcohol-free" written on them, still burn my mouth. This tastes like water (which I like because I hate the artificial, strong minty flavor) and it really gets rid of the morning breath! I use it more often (like after each meal) because I like it so much. I strongly recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: J Chen

customer_reviews.title: Essential daily mouth rinse
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Clōsys for a couple of years. I don't use the mint flavoring, so it feels about like swishing my mouth out with water. I do it once a day, after cleaning my teeth at night. My gums had been receding a bit before starting it, but now with this mouthwash (along with their toothpaste), they have been stable. Before this, I used a drugstore alcohol-free mouthwash. It was cheaper, but I like the way Clōsys feels and works much better.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Shenaut

customer_reviews.title: No taste and no alcohol is perfect for my sensitive gums
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep gums pink and healthy. No taste and no alcohol is perfect for my sensitive gums. Helped stop a puffy gum infection - I took my toothbrush and gently brushed around the sore spot and it really helped.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Very clean feeling without the burn
customer_reviews.text: What I love about this product is that you can swish, gargle or otherwise just hold the stuff in your mouth for an indefinite period of time without the burn of typical alcohol mouthwashes (Scope, Listerine, etc.). And of course, the longer in contact with your mouth, the more germs it kills. Oral hygiene is so important! Not only for preventing costly and painful cavities, but for overall health and wellbeing.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great service from seller
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been using this mouthwash for several years now and he really likes it. It doesnt have a very strong flavor so it doesnt sting like others and leaves your mouth fresh. We used to by directly from Amazon but they stopped supplying it so we tried this other seller (Express Health) and the price and service were great. Will definitely buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: H. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Saved my marriage
customer_reviews.text: I told my husband he had bad breath every night for six years and blamed his brushing/flossing technique. Turns out this miracle product is the cure! He told his dentist about my complaint, and the dentist recommended Closys mouthwash to kill certain bacteria. Worked the very first night!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mouthwash!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mouthwash ever! A bit more expensive than Listerine or some of the others, but worth it (getting S&S is a great deal too!). Some of the reviews talk about a strange taste, but I've never had that. In fact, this is the only mouthwash I've tried hat leaves your mouth feeling clean without the stinging sensation of the alcohol based mouthwashes.
customer_reviews.author: Nick N

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my dentist
customer_reviews.text: This mouthwash is very effective when used as directed. I especially like that it is alcohol-free so it doesn't burn when I use it. I've never used the flavor packet that comes with it; it's not all that bad without it. The price here on Amazon, at least at the time of this review, is slightly cheaper than I've found elsewhere, especially using the subscribe and save option.
customer_reviews.author: A. Robins

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap, but very good
customer_reviews.text: This is now my preferred mouth rinse. At times it kinda tastes like pool water, but my mouth always feels fresh and clean afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: We started using this after our dentist recommended it. We have been using it now for ...
customer_reviews.text: We started using this after our dentist recommended it. We have been using it now for about 3 years. It is seemingly expensive, but you only use about a tablespoon size per dose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was recommended by our dentist
customer_reviews.text: Husband and I both love this mouthwash. It doesn't burn like other mouthwashes. Definitely works well. My husband used to have consistently bad breath but this mouthwash cleared it up. He uses it a couple times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Dentist Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this after oral surgery; the doc recommended it to keep bacteria down. It tastes like 'nothing' and your breath will smell like 'nothing' after you use it - For most of the day. It does come with mint flavoring, just in case you can't stand the taste of 'nothing' but i don't find it necessary.
customer_reviews.author: PKG

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this while traveling because I had a gum infection and was getting horrible breath. I never heard of the product before but bought it because the store was out of Listerine. My infection healed rapidly and it cured the bad breath instantly. Since that time, I've continued to use it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Best there is
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a mouthwash that truly freshens your breath and eliminates odors without the minty mouthwash smell, this is the stuff. My dentist turned me on to this several years ago and I've been using it consistently ever since. The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is the cost, and it does not contain fluoride.
customer_reviews.author: iMpAlEr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Oral Rinse
customer_reviews.text: I began using this oral rinse about 4 years ago after oral surgery....it was recommended by the oral surgeon and my regular dentist. Have been very pleased with it and per my dentist it really does contribute to good oral health.....not just minty fresh breath like many cheaper mouthwashes. I have had perfect dental check-ups for years and I am sure this helps.
customer_reviews.author: SandyM

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps your mouth in an Alkaline state so when you brush your teeth stay strong and undamaged. I use it as part of the Total Mouth system along with Colgate, Zellie gum and Act. my teeth feel clean, kinda slippery and strong. Best part I haven't had sensitive issues.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Best mouthwash- Works like no other- really!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best oral rinse product bar none- Makes a big difference in dental +gum health and breath as well. Hard to find and fairly expensive, but it really does work and I'll keep buying it.Their toothpaste is excellent too, but needs more foam! Otherwise, the best!
customer_reviews.author: SuzanneDel

customer_reviews.title: Mr
customer_reviews.text: I used this product a few years agoafter it was recommended by my South African dentist. It worked wonders. It kills the compounds that cause bad breath instantly. But I lost touch with the dentist I used to but it from. I tried to order it online but was told it cannot be shipped to SA. Well, I am in the US now and went looking for it. I have ordered it using my US address and bought some from the drug store nearby. I am stocking it in bulk. I wish it was available in SA. I am ready to be its distributor (and evangelist!)
customer_reviews.author: Vusi

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this; it took away the bad breath. I have seen my dentist and found no decay in my teeth. I wear upper and lower dentures and it used to be towards the end of the day; I will have a fowl taste and bad breath. This product was recommended to me by my dental hygienist. It 100% work and solved the bad problem of bad breath.
customer_reviews.author: Bino Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Great Mouthwash! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: This mouth wash is excellent. Keeps your mouth much cleaner than other mouthwashes. When I have cancer sores, I use it many times a day and it releaves the pain and helps them heal in half the time! Worth the extra price just for healing those painful cancer sores! Mouth germs contribute to many other deseases in your body due to the close connection to your blood system thus keeping down the colony count of germs in your mouth helps the health of your whole body! Very important to use a good mouthwash and floss often.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy M.

customer_reviews.title: ... my gingivitis and my oral health is so much better. No more bad breath
customer_reviews.text: It has help me reduce my gingivitis and my oral health is so much better. No more bad breath! It's great.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J macias

customer_reviews.title: Owe it my destist for this product
customer_reviews.text: My dentist introduced me to Closys mouth wash after I had my teeth cleaned a few month ago.. I have used it twice a day for about 3 months now. No complaints. Glad he introduced me to it. Goldie
customer_reviews.author: Goldie

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: This product -- along with the Closys toothpaste -- was recommended to me by my dentist. It solved my persistent concern that I had bad breath. It's refreshing and I like that it's alcohol free.
customer_reviews.author: N. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product but will no longer be buying it .The price has doubled from $24.95 to $48 for 2 32oz bottles .To bad it works !
customer_reviews.author: roger s womack

customer_reviews.title: Dentist Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My dentist recommeded Closys because he said it doesn't kill the good bacteria only the bad bacteria. There is virtually no taste to this and doesn't sting your mouth like the alcohol based ones. It comes with a little bit of mint flavored liquid that you can squeeze into the mouthwash for just a little taste. Otherwise it tastes like water. One thing is for sure, it gets rid of any bad breath you have. I think a smoker could use this and you couldn't tell they had just smoked, it is that good. Amazon used to sell 2 for $19.99 but haven't seen that lately. Walgreens puts them on sale for $10.99 sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkman

customer_reviews.title: My Standby
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for several years and, while it isn't magic, it really does suppress the odors. After I floss, I brush my teeth with Closys toothpaste and then rinse. It works.
customer_reviews.author: BilltheNuke

customer_reviews.title: I like this product a lot!
customer_reviews.text: This Closys product is really unusual, and I like it a lot. Fresh breath without added flavors, unless you'd like to use the peppermint oil they send along in a tiny bottle along with the big bottle. Some sort of patented chlorine-type ingredient kills germs, freshens breath, very pleasant to use, and without the heavy flavors typical of most similar products. I had asked my dentist about this, having seen an ad, and he recommended it. I have a smaller bottle of Closys that I use when I travel. Highly recommend. David in Telluride, CO
customer_reviews.author: David in Telluride, Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Does What is Says!
customer_reviews.text: The shipment arrived on time and the oral rinse definitely makes my mouth feel cleaner! This product is recommended to provide you with a cleaner mouth before you brush to help eliminate the spread of germs inside your mouth.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Great dental care
customer_reviews.text: Closys was recommend by our dentist and have been purchasing ever since from you. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Debra L Dodwell

customer_reviews.title: Clean breath and no burn
customer_reviews.text: I used to hate mouthwashes. They sting my mouth and I don't feel any different afterwards. Then Closys comes along. It feels weird at first, gargling without any taste or burning sensation. The reward comes afterwards. I feel fresh, clean and more confident talking near my husband and close friends. You have a choice to add flavor drops or use the plain version. I added the flavor because I was trying to get my husband to use Closys. Found out later that he loved it with or without the flavor drops! I strongly recommend this product. If you are hesitant, Amazon sells trial packages!
customer_reviews.author: Gladstone Frau

customer_reviews.title: No dyes and doesn't burn your mouth
customer_reviews.text: This, and Biotene Dry Mouth, are the only 2 mouthwashes that don't burn my mouth and don't contain a bunch of dyes. I like this better than Biotene because I can control the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: TreeHugger

customer_reviews.title: Closys Antiseptic Oral Rinse
customer_reviews.text: My dentist recommended this because I have a tooth with bone loss at the root, and he felt it to be the best prevention for decay of a vulnerable tooth. I like the fact that it has no alcohol and doesn't burn--I use it without the flavoring.
customer_reviews.author: Almita Ranstrom

customer_reviews.title: closys mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: My dentist and doctor both highly recommended this product. The add-in flavor is awful and I don't use it. Otherwise it seems to be a good product
customer_reviews.author: JSS

customer_reviews.title: like toothpaste as they advertise
customer_reviews.text: It clean does not burn or leave nasty after taste. My teeth are clean and white and I drink way too many sodas
customer_reviews.author: HospitalWorker

customer_reviews.title: I am glad to have discovered Closys products a few years ago.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Closys mouthwash as well as the Closys toothpaste for several years. It has paid off handsomely when my dental hygienist cleans my teeth. Her chores involved with cleaning my teeth have been reduced ever since I switched to Closys.
customer_reviews.author: ARNOLD

customer_reviews.title: Love this mouthwash.
customer_reviews.text: Great mouthwash, taste good as it is without the flavouring added.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Closys Mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a few years and It is fabulous. I have notice great improvement in my gum health and breathe
customer_reviews.author: Kit Calafato

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: No strong taste (although you can add some flavor with the included flavor bottle), makes your mouth feel clean and fresh, and no burning. Recommended by my dentist and it is great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST MOUTHWASH EVER INVENTED
customer_reviews.text: My dentist recommended this product and I have been using it for the past six months. I have recommended it and just as satisfied as I am are those to whom I recommended Closys. I will not change this product for any other. It leave you with a clean, fresh breath and I noticed my teeth are even whiter. The tongue scrapers are light and easy for travel. This product is magnificient.
customer_reviews.author: Carol F White

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I had been buying this at Walgreens, but they don't always have in stock. I'm getting a better deal for a product my dentist recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Closys  was recommended by dentist
customer_reviews.text: Closys is a very mild mouthwash but has the extra peppermint flavor included so you can adjust the taste. It has been an excellent rinse so far.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great for mint sensitive mouths
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of this from my dentist and like the way it felt in my mouth. It is mint free with a dropper bottle of mint if you would like mint in it. I have a mint sensitive mouth and have no issues with this.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M. Read

customer_reviews.title: Closys Alcohol-Free Mouthwash, With Flavor Control, 32 Fluid Ounce (946 ml)...
customer_reviews.text: We really like this because it does not have a bad flavor. It comes with a flavor bottle you can add to it, but both of us do not use it!.
customer_reviews.author: Read for Fun

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by a dentist some years ago. We've kept at least one bottle in the house ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Gene B. Williams

customer_reviews.title: BEST mouth wash you will ever use!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old has bad breath all the time - even after eating and brushing her teeth. Because of her bad breath, she suffered socially - embarrassed to talk to people. My dentist recommended this mouth wash and it has worked wonders! She uses it three times a day and she no longer has bad breath. She has blossomed socially. I recommend this product to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: kim murphy

customer_reviews.title: Best mouthwash on the market! But read on...
customer_reviews.text: Best mouthwash on the market...bar none! I've been using it for years. The only bad news is, Amazon is now making it cost prohibitive to purchase here. I used to be able to buy two bottles for $23 and change. It must be getting popular now so they increase the price by $16 for two bottles... That is a 59% increase - TOTALLY INSANE! It can be purchased at Walgreens for between $13 and $15 per bottle. Which means it's not the manufacture increasing the price. Walgreens, much cheaper than here.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because it leaves your mouth feeling clean and not pasty like after using toothpaste. Great job!
customer_reviews.author: 2 Amazon Shoppers

customer_reviews.title: I would recomend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Dentist told me about this product...along with the other changes I have made in my routine, my dentist has seen huge improvments! Use this, it works.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L Hamel

customer_reviews.title: Kills bacteria as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This stuff keeps my hygienist happy. I used to have problems with pockets in my gums, now in part due to closys, I don't.
customer_reviews.author: Vicente V.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, gets the plaque and leaves your mouth ...
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff, gets the plaque and leaves your mouth fresha nd clean. All without the burn of alcohol. My Dentist really likes this product.
customer_reviews.author: Duckless

customer_reviews.title: good rinse
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I use it straight, don't really like mint this mint that.. great for teeth, would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Cali Mama

customer_reviews.title: Really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a couple of years based on the recommendation of my dentist, who said it would help rid my mouth of much of the bacteria. This makes for a cleaner breath and less plaque. Unlike other mouthwashes that are so strong in taste that they are unpleasant to use, I have a choice of leaving this flavor free or adding a light touch of mint (included) to the mix. My gums are healthier and my mouth feels fresh after using Closys.
customer_reviews.author: Panchi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic results - odorless and tasteless - perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my dentist, this has made immediate improvements on my gums! I can't taste it, and I do not put the flavor drops in, though I guess it wouldn't hurt. I use it after flossing and before bed, so by the morning I don't notice any aftertaste at all. It's incredible how much my gums have improved in only 6 months of using this a few times a week. There is no stinging; no alcohol, no staining and I think it is a wonderful product to have on the Ship & Save schedule.
customer_reviews.author: R. E. Richter

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST MOUTHWASH EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: My header is not a lie-this mouthwash was the most effective thing battling my dry mouth symptoms (which embarrassingly I have to admit at times would lead to not so fresh breath) I used this in my arsenal flossing, brushing and tongue cleaning-this took it to the next level-and even made my teeth seem whiter to me! I love this mouthwash and the price is the best here on Amazon with the subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Closys Oral Rinse
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have used Closys Oral Rinse for a few years now. My dentist has always recommended it. In fact, he recommends it to all his patients and even passes out coupons. It is alcohol free and you actually wake up without morning breath!
customer_reviews.author: welden50

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: My dentist recommends this product. Taste is mild and pleasant to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Barclay

customer_reviews.title: Almost No Tartar after 4 months!
customer_reviews.text: This is great product! I had serious 4-5 mm pockets at my last checkup and had to have laser treatment to remove diseased tissue. My hygenist recommended this product. I used it twice daily for the 4 months until my next cleaning. All my gums were healthy, and almost no tartar! I love that this is a non-alcohol based rinse, no burning sensation, just clean minty taste. I use one capful and rinse for the 30 seconds. It is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene M. Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Closys
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It was recommended by my dentist and it does an awesome job of keeping my mouth clean & fresh throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: T. Delacruz

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is pretty dang good
customer_reviews.text: I feel extremely good about using this stuff. It neutralizes tonsil stones pretty well, which is why I bought it. It came with a sample of the toothpaste which I ended up liking, too. And then I found out you can get it at Walgreens.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Closys was specified by my dentist to be used with the Hydro Floss unit as a part of a pre-periodontal disease treatment. It appears to be working as expected. Can't really get too enthused about a anti-bacterial mouthwash.
customer_reviews.author: MrBill610

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that you can control the flavor or no flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Closys is worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: One year ago I started using Closys, as it was recommended for treating gum pocket problems. I had a root canal many years ago, which eventually got crowned and over the years it eroded into a huge pocket. At the time I started using Closys, a periodontist said that I was in danger of losing the tooth if the pocket didn't shrink. So I began using the Cloysis rinse and at my last check up a couple of months ago, it had shrunk considerably and the tooth is saved. It costs a bit more than Scope and LIsterine, but it's definitely cheaper than oral surgery!
customer_reviews.author: Ethelyn Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a consistent user of Listerine and more alcohol-based mouthwashes but my girlfriend always complains about the smell. This has no smell, and no real taste, but still works amazingly well. I'd recommend against adding the mint oil. It just kind of floats on top so your first couple sips are overly minty, and then it completely goes away. Highly recommended though!
customer_reviews.author: Ansol

customer_reviews.title: Oral Mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: I rated a 4 star because it taste pretty good and I was told by my dentist to use this mouthwash. It helps to keep your breath good.
customer_reviews.author: donald Brown

customer_reviews.title: Closys mouth wash
customer_reviews.text: I use it as indicated. The mouth feels cleaner and healthier. We'll see what the dentist finds in my next cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Raquelita

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my dentist
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fact that you have the option to add a flavor (which is provided) to the mouthwash or not. I do not add it because I do not like that mouthwash-y aftertaste! When you don't add the flavor, it is like swishing with plain water. Even my young grandsons prefer this mouthwash over others.
customer_reviews.author: Iron Chef Raganit

customer_reviews.title: Closys gets rid of gingivitis
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves closys. The dentist. Advised him to start using Closys ti help remove gingivitis. He said his teeth have never felt better. We will continue using it.
customer_reviews.author: S Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Closys MouthWash
customer_reviews.text: My dental hygienist recommendedd this product. It is a bit pricey in the drugstore so I wasn very pleased with the price from Amazon. Now I can always have a supply at nominal cost.
customer_reviews.author: grammyof5

customer_reviews.title: Clean and Fresh White Teeth
customer_reviews.text: Closys is part of Dr. Ellie Phillips' Clean White Teeth System. This flavorless rinse eliminates your mouth's volatile sulfur compounds and leaves your mouth remarkably clean and fresh. I intend to keep on using this product indefinitely.
customer_reviews.author: Kathe Romano

customer_reviews.title: My dentist recommends it
customer_reviews.text: The subscription works well. I am notified before its shipped and I can cancel a shipmeny or change the interval.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn P. Deuschle

customer_reviews.title: Did a great job eliminating mouth odor
customer_reviews.text: it works. The mouthwash has no taste. IF you want, you can add pepper flavor (provided). Just be careful not to put too much flavor into the mouthwash
customer_reviews.author: JINGJING J XU

customer_reviews.title: Our dentist strongly recommends this
customer_reviews.text: This is a great price for the mouthwash our doctor recommends for its germ-killing qualities. It comes unflavored but has a mint packet to add to it to it. This is hard to find and an excellent price to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miracle mouthwash from Amazon.com
customer_reviews.text: I had constant mouthpain and toothaches. But I am on chemo and cannot have dental work done. I went to the dentist to see if there was anything non invasive he could do to relieve my discomfort. He gave me Closys mouthwash to rinse with 4 times a day. From the first rinse till current I have had no pain. Dentist says it kills the bacteria. When I finished what the dentist gave me, I obtained the next shipment from Amazon .com, which came the next day. I love the mouthwash and Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Best mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: I was given a trial size by my dentist and really liked the product. The rinse caused no burning and you could add flavor if preferred with the small dropper of peppermint oil. I will stick with this product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pawlick

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This product was bought for my 89-year old mother. She was having trouble with bad breath. Actually, I guess it was me that had the biggest problem as she travels by car with me. Anyway, it works like magic for her; problem solved. This product is less expensive than the like product we can buy at our local drugstore which is another advantage for folks who are trying to live on social security.
customer_reviews.author: Jouetcat

customer_reviews.title: excellent rinse when following "Kiss Your Dentist Goodbye"
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for over a year now. At a friend's recommendation I read a book entitled. I have a history of poor oral health and it seems that, no matter how often I brushed, I would still get cavities. This book, along with the Closys and Xylitol gum have changed the oral health of my mouth. I haven't had a cavity or any tooth sensitivity since using this mouthwash. The author's recommendation is rinse with Closys, brush, floss, rinse with Listerine and then rinse with Act. Also have some xylitol (a sweetener) every day. I keep xylitol gum on hand and chew that after meals. It's done wonders for my mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: perfect product both shipping and results
customer_reviews.text: My dentist recommended this to me when it was discovered I had severe ginvitis, the only problem the price the dentist was selling it at was astronomical. I Looked on Amazon ordered it and now Im hooked! I have ordered it twice and getting ready to order again. It helps and Amazon delivers as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Peters

customer_reviews.title: Won't stain your teeth, no flavor needed
customer_reviews.text: I got this after having problems with blue colored mouthwashes staining my teeth. It doesn't stain, and leaves a fresh clean taste. No super mint punch that keeps you from eating for hours after. I love this and even set it up to be auto delivered. The only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is the bottle doesn't travel well. It leaks from the top, like the cap doesn't seal well. I just use another washed out mouthwash bottle for travel.
customer_reviews.author: BMc

customer_reviews.title: Best Clean Without The Sting
customer_reviews.text: I was first introduced to this product a couple of years ago. Highly reccommended to those that do not like the burning sensation that would would get from other mouthwash products. This product provides a flavor shot for taste preferences.
customer_reviews.author: C. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: The hype is true, fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: This product is worth the bucks: it really freshens your mouth and keeps your breath clean. I drink a lot of coffee and just hate "coffee breath". No worries anymore. I saw improvement within 24 hours of starting with Closys, no more coffee breath, it lasts all day! I've been using this product now for 6 months; I'm not going back to any other oral rinse now that I use the "gold standard".
customer_reviews.author: TwinCities

customer_reviews.title: Dentist recommended for appliance soaking, worked well.
customer_reviews.text: New CPAP oral appliance requires careful cleaning and soaking to control bacteria growth. Dentist specifically recommended this product. It has functioned excellently.
customer_reviews.author: judy davis

customer_reviews.title: Great mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: I love this mouthwash. I switched from Crest after finding out it could potentially stain your teeth. I enjoy the ability to control the flavor of your mouthwash. You can add more drops of peppermint oil or less depending on your preferences.
customer_reviews.author: VinnieC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best product out there for good mouth hygiene and those who eat spicy all the time!!!
customer_reviews.author: nanosecond

customer_reviews.title: Antiseptic Rinse
customer_reviews.text: This is a prescribed oral rinse for a Dental/Medical condition and has proven to be very effective item for the condition I am working with. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: James Ranstrom

customer_reviews.title: cloyse oral rinse
customer_reviews.text: Closys oral rinse was recommended by my dentist to use in the hydrofloss. My dental heath has improved since I began using the rinse with the hydrofloss, and hydro brush....good system
customer_reviews.author: rita Isbell

customer_reviews.title: Whatever this stuff is, it doesn't do anything. ...
customer_reviews.text: Whatever this stuff is, it doesn't do anything. Overpriced clear liquid. Made no impact on my dental care at all.
customer_reviews.author: Meggo

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I tried this mouthwash because it had great reviews and thought it would be good to try something different. I don't like the taste. My wife agrees and thinks it tastes like dirt, even after adding in the flavor drops. I felt committed to finish it off, but I can't. I'm going back to Crest.
customer_reviews.author: M. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Purchased For My Husband
customer_reviews.text: My husbands dentist suggested he purchase this item. We found the better on line. We just had to buy larger size. It keeps, he will use it sooner or later
customer_reviews.author: Mike Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Product is terrific but price is ridiculous--what's the deal?
customer_reviews.text: We bought the two-pack of 32-oz bottles for about $34 in the summer. And now they're almost $100???? Something is messed up with the pricing here. You can get it on the CVS website for a fraction of this cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J.

customer_reviews.title: Packaging damaged!
customer_reviews.text: Had to throw one of the bottles away! Other than that, the "flavor control" is a strange way to do things...........
customer_reviews.author: Adam LeGrant

product_meta.title: Closys Alcohol Free Mouthwash with Flavor Control, 32oz (Pack of 2)
product_meta.description: With its strong performance against the oral bacteria that causes infections of the peridontium and endodontium, as well as dental caries and staph infections, and its favorable behavior toward healing cells (fibroblasts), Cloys addresses a spectrum of clinical oral hygiene concerns. Finally, its agreeable taste and non-tooth-staining characteristics encourage patients to be fully compliant. As a non-prescription oral rinse, Cloys not only meets and may surpass CHX in post-procedure applications, it also can be recommended for twice-daily regular oral care as a maintenance and preventative measure. Cloys is now a premium standard for daily oral care.
feature_bullets: Works gently but efficiently; no alcohol to burn your mouth
Kills 99% of harmful bacteria in 10 seconds
